long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily copy a shrug to your clipboard ("¯\_(ツ)_/¯ ")

Click the icon to add the emoticon to your clipboard.

The icon turns green if it's copied, or red if there was a problem.
